英文公告.機關名稱: TAIWAN RAILWAY ADMINISTRATION, MINISTRY OF TRANSPORTATION AND COMMUNICATIONS
英文公告.標案名稱: Tender object: Multi-Card Electronic Ticketing System Service Project around Taiwan railway from 2013 to 2015.
英文公告.廠商名稱: Far eastern electronic toll collection co, ltd.
英文公告.廠商地址: 28F., No.207, Sec. 2, Dunhua S. Rd., Da’an Dist., Taipei City 106, Taiwan (R.O.C.)
英文公告.附加說明: 1.Working duration: Time limit for Contract performance:Dec 31,2015.2.Bidder qualification:A.Domestic company(1)Bidder should be Information Software Service Company(I301010), Data Processing Service Company(I301020), Information Supply Service Company(I301030), or Electronic Ticketing Company(HZ05011).(2)Bidder should have evidential documents to do this project. Please provide related work experiences documents and card issued records or related documents.B.Foreign company(1)WTO Government Procurement member are allowed to bid.(2)Foreign company should provide Taiwan government authorized branch office (Including branch unit, representative's office)register documents, and should meet the qualification of domestic company. Providing related work experiences evidential documents and certified Chinese translation. 3.Address for Obtaining Tender Documentation: Financial procurement section PURCHASING & STORE DEPARTMENT, Taiwan Railway AdministrationRoom.5075,5F, No.3 PEI-PING WEST ROAD,TAIPEI, TAIWAN. R.O.C

決標資料.履約執行機關: 機關代碼：3.15.18機關名稱：交通部臺灣鐵路管理局
決標資料.附加說明: 本案採公告固定費用決標:(1).清分費用：:(一)票證公司清分處理票款，本局支付每筆 0.327元。(二)、當本案單一立約商使用人次達650萬筆/月時，超過之部分， 清分費用本局另與該立約商議減之，並經立約雙方同意後實施，折扣後費用自達650萬筆/月當月起計算。 (2).加值佣金：車站處理電子票證加值，本局依加值筆數，每筆1.7元(含稅)計收。
